title: The Best Time Loop Game of The Year - The Blessing Show
description:
Deathloop, Returnal, 12 Minutes, and the list goes on. This year has a lot of games that have one major thing in common. In this episode of The Blessing Show, Blessing breaks down what's up with time loops.
